title: Cruel Hearts
description: It’s dog eat dog at Templar Academy.I’m about to get eaten alive… And I think I’ll like it.I thought I had skeletons in my closet.Turns out I have a whole cemetery.But that’s nothing compared to these bullies.Maxwell, Kendrick, and Orlando are wealthy, wicked, and devilishly delicious.They crossed me last term, and now I will uncover their secrets.I’ll have them groveling at my feet.Make them beg for mercy.As long as I can resist their wandering hands and luscious lips.As long as I can stop myself from falling in love.
author: Sofia Daniel
